subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: No. 3 Virginia had managed to keep winning even when it was without Anderson, its star player, but he could not prevent Friday’s upset loss to North Carolina in the A.C.C. semifinals.
snippet: No. 3 Virginia had managed to keep winning even when it was without Anderson, its star player, but he could not prevent Friday’s upset loss to North Carolina in the A.C.C. semifinals.
